text: Rivière-Mistassini is an unorganized territory in the Canadian province of Quebec, located in the regional county municipality of Maria-Chapdelaine. The territory had a population of 31 as of the Canada 2011 Census, and covered a land area of 18,460.51 km2. The eponymous Mistassini River has its source in the far northern part of the territory and entirely bisects it from north to south. ==Demographics== Population trend:Statistics Canada: 1996, 2001, 2006, 2011 census * Population in 2011: 31 (2006 to 2011 population change: 210.0%) * Population in 2006: 10 * Population in 2001: 0 * Population in 1996: 0 * Population in 1991: 0 Private dwellings occupied by usual residents: 14 (total dwellings: 16) ==References== Category:Unorganized territories in Saguenay–Lac-Saint-Jean Category:Maria- Chapdelaine Regional County Municipality
title: Rivière-Mistassini, Quebec
